data.name: Monster Energy Supercross 4 - Credits Multiplier
data.detailed_description: Buy the Credits Multiplier and speed up your game progress: it multiplies the credits obtained at the end of every race in all modes, whether online or offline.
data.about_the_game: Buy the Credits Multiplier and speed up your game progress: it multiplies the credits obtained at the end of every race in all modes, whether online or offline.
data.short_description: Buy the Credits Multiplier and speed up your game progress!

fullgame.name: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 4

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
